title: US Rider Jorgenson Back in Yellow after Visma Crushes Paris-Nice TTT
content:
The American will wear yellow in a Paris-Nice stage for the first time Wednesday after winning last year's 'Race to the Sun' on the final day.

Read the full article at US Rider Jorgenson Back in Yellow after Visma Crushes Paris-Nice TTT on Velo.
author: ahood
